name: Clumsy Jumper
description:
Test your dexterity and skill, overcoming interesting, but very difficult obstacles that you will encounter at the levels Clumsy Jumper!
Perform insane stunts and many coups to get more valuable rewards, and then try to land carefully so as not to break something for yourself :)
The rules of the game are quite simple, but can you pass it to the end?

Features

✔ Realistic and funny character physics
✔ Many interesting and exciting levels
✔ Obstacles that will give you a real challenge
✔ Ability to ease the game by turning on assistant mode
✔ A shop full of different tricks and characters
✔ Share GIF animations of your gaming moments with friends

The game will still be updated and it is very important for me that you leave comments and share your opinion. Write what you would like to add, and, on the contrary, correct or remove.

Be sure to look in and subscribe here:
